trans-unit.source: Test classes, classes marked with the '[TestClass]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic.
trans-unit.target: Test classes, classes marked with the '[TestClass]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic.

trans-unit.source: Test class '{0}' should not be generic
trans-unit.target: Test class '{0}' should not be generic

trans-unit.source: Test classes should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: Test classes should have valid layout

trans-unit.source: Test methods, methods marked with the '[TestMethod]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic - it should not be 'abstract' - return type should be 'void' or 'Task' - it should not be 'async void' - it should be a special method (finalizer, operator...).
trans-unit.target: Test methods, methods marked with the '[TestMethod]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic - it should not be 'abstract' - return type should be 'void' or 'Task' - it should not be 'async void' - it should be a special method (finalizer, operator...).

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should not be 'async void'
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should not be 'async void'

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should not be generic
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should not be generic

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should be an 'ordinary' method
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should be an 'ordinary' method

trans-unit.source: Test methods should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: Test methods should have valid layout

trans-unit.source: By default, MSTest runs tests within the same assembly sequentially, which can lead to severe performance limitations. It is recommended to enable assembly attribute '[Parallelize]' to run tests in parallel, or if the assembly is known to not be parallelizable, to use explicitly the assembly level attribute '[DoNotParallelize]'.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，MSTest 会按顺序运行测试，这可能会导致严重性能限制。建议启用程序集属性“Parallelize”，或者如果已知程序集不可并行，则显式使用程序集级别属性“DoNotParallelize”。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly enable or disable tests parallelization
trans-unit.target: 显式启用或禁用测试并行化

trans-unit.source: Explicitly enable or disable tests parallelization
trans-unit.target: 显式启用或禁用测试并行化
